SELECT TMP.`member_id` , TMP.`email` , TMP.`password` , TMP.`member_name` , TMP.`address` , TMP.`party` , TMP.`allias` , TMP.`grade_id` , GR.`grade_type` , TMP.`group_type` , R.`restrict_id`
FROM ( SELECT M.`member_id` , M.`email` , M.`password` , M.`member_name` , M.`address` , M.`party` , M.`allias` , M.`grade_id` , M.`group_id` , G.`group_type` FROM MEMBER M inner join `GROUPS` G on M.`group_id` = G.`group_id` ) TMP left outer join `RESTRICT` R on TMP.member_id = R.member_id , GRADE GR WHERE TMP.grade_id = GR.grade_id ORDER BY TMP.`member_id` LIMIT #{pagination.limitStart}, #{recordSize} ;

SELECT TMP.`member_id` , TMP.`email` , TMP.`password` , TMP.`member_name` , TMP.`address` , TMP.`party` , TMP.`allias` , TMP.`grade_id` , GR.`grade_type` , TMP.`group_type` , R.`restrict_id`
FROM ( SELECT M.`member_id` , M.`email` , M.`password` , M.`member_name` , M.`address` , M.`party` , M.`allias` , M.`grade_id` , M.`group_id` , G.`group_type` FROM MEMBER M inner join `GROUPS` G on M.`group_id` = G.`group_id` ) TMP left outer join `RESTRICT` R on TMP.member_id = R.member_id , GRADE GR WHERE TMP.grade_id = GR.grade_id AND TMP.email = #{email};
